casebody.data:
Gregg MADIGOSKY
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 17, 2017

Brittany B. Paz, in support of the petition.

Sarah Hanna, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Gregg Madigosky's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn.App. 242, 158 A.3d 809 (2017), is denied.
